titleStmt.title: Elizabetha quasi viuens Eliza's funerall. A fevve Aprill drops, showred on the hearse of dead Eliza. Or The funerall teares af [sic] a true hearted subiect. By H.P.
titleStmt.author: Petowe, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Allde for M. Lawe, dvvelling, in Paules Church-yard, neere vnto Saint Austens gate,

notesStmt.note: In this edition, partly printed from the standing type of STC 19803.5, title page line 8 has "Subiect".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
